name: Futurelab.my
description: FutureLab is a social enterprise that connects youth to industry mentors across Southeast Asia to help them pursue their dream career. They offer a platform that connects mentors and mentees seeking a path of personal growth and career advancements. FutureLab’s vision is to empower and enable the youth to achieve a purposeful life through mentorship and community support. They have over 3000 mentors joining them on their mission to empower youth across Southeast Asia in discovering and propelling their careers.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Headline: Fast track your carrer growth with mentorship
ShortDescription: FutureLab.my is an online mentoring platform and community that aims to make mentorship accessible for all. We are HRD Corp Certified Training Provider.
enhanced_description: FutureLab.my is an online mentoring platform and social enterprise designed to connect youth across Southeast Asia with over 3000 industry mentors. The platform facilitates personal growth and career advancement through mentorship and community support, empowering youth to achieve purposeful lives and careers. As an HRD Corp Certified Training Provider, FutureLab.my makes mentorship accessible for all, offering session-wise coaching and aiming to build micro-entrepreneurs.
key_use_cases: Career development and guidance for youth
Skill acceleration and learning efficiency through coaching
Connecting mentees with industry professionals for career advancement
competitive_advantages: Large network of over 3000 industry mentors
Focus on youth empowerment and career development in Southeast Asia
Accreditation as an HRD Corp Certified Training Provider
Aims to make mentorship accessible for all
roi_benefits: Accelerated skill development and learning efficiency for mentees
Improved career trajectory and personal growth for youth
Potential for faster and more efficient talent sourcing (for employers accessing developed talent from the platform)
compliance_features: HRD Corp Certified Training Provider standards
